name: Arkasect - My first game ever
description:
My first game ever. :)

Arrows move left and right. Space bar launches the ball

The game is an arkanoid/breakout like, but with insects instead of blocks.

Arkasect is a game in which you control insects fighting against evil in their forest. The game is about hitting a ball to destroy other insects enemies. In this adventure you'll pass through five completely different worlds and you'll can collect power-ups to help you.
